name: Unfaireum
description:
You are a very successful warrior and nobody can beat you in the colosseum. Mostly because you have a gun and that you are fighting against a bunch of penguins in robotic armor. Suddenly, you are declared the main boss on the arena and all the penguins start to target you. Shouldn't be a big deal as long as they approach you one by one.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows to move
  • Right Click/Space/Z to Jump
  • Left Click/X to Shoot

Prefer to play in fullscreen, because the UI does not scale depending on the size of the game window.

Github Repository: https://github.com/Daniikk1012/Unfaireum
